aushadha alewi kirimedi pawathina aachara dharma ha nithi kadakarana osu sal himiyan soya watalim aarambha karana lesata saukhya amathya maithripala sirisena mahatha jathika aushadha adhikariyata upades laba di atha.danata diwayina pura sitina osu sal himiyan siyalu dena disthrik mattamen kandawa aushadha sandaha wana rajaye nirdesha saha aachara dharma pilibanda danuwath kirime wadapiliwelak da aarambha kara athi bawa saukhya amathyanshaya pawasayi.

yodana kalaye tharamata aadhunika blog karuwanta prayojanayak ath nowena bawak penna thibuna nisa blog handunwadimata wenama lipi pala kirima nokalath thawamath oonima blog adawiyak ekathu karagannawa podi udawwak eeken labeyi kiyana balaporoththuwen eelangata patan gaththa blog adawiya wune aalakamandawa , hithu tharam kalayak aalakamandawa wenuwen wen karanna nolabunath hithuwatath wada sarthaka wunu wyapruthiyak widihatayi mata danenne , marthu aprel mayi masa thunata eka masayata eka bagin lipi pala welath masa 6k thula labila thiyana samstha piwisum sankhyawa sathutu dayakayi ( dayinamik wiw thula thiyana piwisum sankhya gatalu salakillata aragenath ) ee nisa blog karanaye dewarsha purnayath ekka aluth wadak aalakamandawa wenuwen patan gannayi yanne , ee aalakamandawe plawena lipi gana danuwath karanna wagema wenama lipiyak liyanna tharam nowena keti thorathuru beda hadaganna aramunen sakasunu aalakamandawe eeka .
